title: New: Pacific Air – Roses
content:
‘The sound of the ocean makes you smile, while the smell of seaweed is on your mind‘ and suddenly we’ve dived into the world of Pacific Air.

Having already drawn comparisons to Passion Pit (as well as earned themselves a support slot), the duo have racked up an impressive 20,000 plays of debut single Float on their Soundcloud. The B-side to the track, Roses is a tooth-rottingly sugary sweet pop number, like biting into a frosted donut and discovering it’s oozing with gorgeous strawberry jam… or something like that.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
